comment.author: 78505398@N07
comment._content: In fact this is the Roman Catholic church, not the Anglican cathedral, and it is not on the site of the slave market.

comment.author: 92930869@N05
comment._content: Mukesh Gajaria To the left of the Roman Catholic steeples is the tallest house in the Stone Town of Zanzibar. I was born there and so were most of my 11 siblings. the address is 157,Gizenga Street.
